tagline: Discussion: (1) Clause (d) of Section 2, Section 6 and 13 of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Pre-emption Act, 1987 (2) Construction of the terms ‘sitting’, ‘meeting’ and ‘(majlis)’ (3) Interpretation of words in parentheses (4) The effect of statutory notice of talb-e-ishhad on printed form/stereotyped specimen/sample.
